Class Account

java.lang.Object
  Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents the account that any customer of a bank has.

See Also:

withdraw

public void withdraw(double amount)
              throws OverdraftException
Makes the withdraw by subtracting to balance the amount

Parameters:
amount - The quantity that represents the withdraw made to the balance of the Account class.
Throws:
OverdraftException - If the amount is bigger than balance
